components.name: 1-hexyl-3-methyl-1H-imidazolium bromide
sample: 0.0560 water mass %;97 mass %(dried by vacuum heating;solvent extraction)

title: Refraction, surface tension, and speed of sound: Refractive index (Na D-line)

ref.full: Shekaari, H.; Zafarani-Moattar, M. T.; Niknam, M. (2016) J. Chem. Thermodyn. 97, 100-112.
ref.title: Thermodynamic behavior of thiophene with octane, 1-hexyl-3-methylimidazolium bromide, or 1-octyl-3-methylimidazolium bromide in dilute region at T = (288.15 to 303.15) K
